turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Good evening, I would hope you are well. I would also like for you to donate to a great charity called Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I might be interested, please explain what Save the Children does?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children program halp children in many different ways. One way is to help them to get nutritional foods to eat.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Are you the leader/facilitator of this program?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am not but I truly think this organization is well worth donating to. They are committed to children in providing health and nutrition programs that save children's lives and ensure they grow up healthy.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: How did you hear about this program?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I heard about this program through friends and family who have volunteered with this program. Have you ever volunteered with any organization?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes I volunteered with a horse rescue ranch when I was in high school, we helped to save, retrain, and rehabilitate injured and neglected animals

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That is awesome! Do you know that what we would spend on one cup of coffee at a restaurant would feed several children through this program? I'm so excited to be feel like I am helping many children live healthy lives. Are you willing to donate to Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: to be honest sir I am a very broke college student who can barely afford to pay his rent or buy my own food. Is there another way I can help

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: The best way would be the monetary donation. Even one or two dollars can help so many children. I think we owe it to these children to help in this way.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: The most I can spare is 25 cents. Would that be alright?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Can I ask if you spend money on candy, snacks of stuff like that? If so the funds spent on that could really be saved to help a child eat healthy. Would you be willing to forgo a snack or two to donate $2 to Save the Children fund?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I really do not spend money on that sort of frivolous thing. If you can understand that $2 is the most I am currently getting paid I will not be able to donate that much. Would 50 cents pacify your need?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Absolutely! 50 cents is better than nothing. I just feel so passionate about donating funds to help these children. In the first two months of this year over 1,000 children were injured or killed in Syria. Save the Children program can help these children in these war zones. Are you sure you wouldn't be able to donate $2?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I wish I could. I think we can agree on 50 cents

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Ok great 50 cents is good and thank you for agreeing to donate.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you for helping me donate to a great cause!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You are welcome! Its so important as people that we always try and help those in need. Thank you!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: did we complete the task? how do we submit this conversation?
